attributes.action: reinstate national service for persistent truents/asbo/known to police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the youth of today who persistantly cause trouble and heartache within  communities,neighbourhoods, schools or shopping areas etc had a stint in a military type programme, they would maybe have more of an incentive to try harder.  Get control of the do gooders, who have no clue whatsoever about living amongst these youths and their families, and take away their right to interfere, as they have been instrumental in taking away our rights to a peaceful and safe life. In short, if a young person causes trouble, they get to learn how to be men the military way. Lots of these children have never been shown how to live amongst others, lets help them stay out of prison
